title: Kuo: Cheaper Apple TV coming later this year to ‘close the gap with competitors’
content:
Reliable Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has a bold prediction for the future of the Apple TV. In a new report today, Kuo says that Apple will launch a cheaper Apple TV model in the second half of this year. The focus of this new model will be on improving the “cost structure” of the Apple TV.

more…

The post Kuo: Cheaper Apple TV coming later this year to ‘close the gap with competitors’ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A cheaper Apple TV is coming later this year, according to reliable Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. Here's what that could mean.
